titleStmt.title: The double-armed man, by the new inuention briefly shewing some famous exploits atchieued by our Brittish bowmen: with seuerall portraitures proper for the pike and bow. / By W.N. archer.
titleStmt.author: Neade, William.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Miles Flesher] for I. Grismand, at the signe of the Gun in Pauls Alley,

notesStmt.note: Variant: with erratum at foot of E3v.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
With: Obiections against the vse of the bow with the pike. [London : W. Jones, ca. 1630].

place.placeName: the signe of the Gun in Pauls Alley
